demo.text1: Internationalization (sometimes shortened to "I18N , meaning "I - eighteen letters -N") is the process of planning and implementing products and services so that they can easily be adapted to specific local languages and cultures, a process called localization . The internationalization process is sometimes called translation or localization enablement .

texts.msg9: To consult your Factory, please click on the button with the Factory name in the side menu
texts.msg8: You have already registered a Factory

success.email_change: A Mail was sent to this address in order to confirm that you can safely use it for this account. Please go check it.
success.submit_photo: Your photo has been uploaded successfully.
success.signup: Your account was created successfully. An activation link was sent to your email adress. Please check it to start using your C2 account

error.signup: An Error Occured While Creating Your Account
error.general: An Error Occured When Submitting Changes.
error.email-or-password: Email address or Password are incorrect

email.used: This email address is already used for another C2 account.

error.block_account: This account has been blocked due to three successive failed attempts. A mail to activate this account again has been sent to your email address.

warning.same_email: This is your current mail address.
warning.second_attempt: This is your second failed attempt to log in to this account. If you fail to log in one more time, this account will be disabled. If you forgot your password, Click on the 'Forgot Password ?' link.

info.disabled_account: This account is disabled. There must be an activation link sent to your email address. Please check it in order to activate your account again.
info.empty_pending_integrations: No pending integration requests for this factory.
